overview: The PROGRESS World Cup 2018  A one-night tournament with the winner earning a title shot of their choice  First Round Matches  Chuck Mambo vs Ruslan  Bad Bones vs Oliver Carter  Adam Brooks vs Einar Ironside  David Francisco vs Naoki Tanizaki  Tournament Semi-Finals  Besties In The World vs Mills & Mayhew  Tournament Final
title: The PROGRESS World Cup 2018
